text:
15 cool things with AliExpress. Flamethrower for car
05 Nov 2019, 22:00 by Nikolai Maslov
Sale in honor of the Bachelor‚Äôs Day in a week. Hurry up to collect coupons! They are available on the main page of the sale, on a special page with coupons, as well as in games that can be found here.
Another opportunity to get special coupons (which can be spent on everything) is to add goods to the basket, earning coins on this. From 11.11 they can be exchanged for coupons of different denominations.
What to put in the basket, and maybe buy it now? We chose the most interesting new items for this material. And the most interesting of them were published in our Telegram channel.
How to save and receive cashback on AliExpress with each purchase?
During Bachelor‚Äôs Day, the most important thing is not to overpay when purchasing goods at an inflated price with invented discounts seller. In order not to miscalculate, you need to use the Letyshops extension. The application collects statistics on the change in the price of the goods and reviews about the seller, compiling detailed graphs and ratings for its users. To use this wealth, three steps are enough: 1. Install the Letyshops extension for your browser (all platforms are supported) .2. Register on the official website and enter data into the extension. 3. Go to the page of the selected product and check with Lety. When registering via our link, it will be maximum. P.S. Lety extension works not only for Ali, but also when shopping at hundreds of other online sites in Russia and abroad.
1. J‚ÄôM Flamethrower in the exhaust pipe



What car owner didn‚Äôt dream of a nitrogen kit, like in Need For Speed, to feel like Vin Diesel driving another car in the latest Fast and the Furious series?
This can even be put on the ‚ÄúOka‚Äù or ‚Äúpenny‚Äù. The option is quite safe, because instead of clean fuel from a special tank, it ignites gasoline vapors exiting through the muffler.
Price: 5 150 4 300 rub., Buy with cashback
2. External battery with Qi Xiaomi



One of the most successful external batteries of the company. Manufacturer - ZMI, made on flat LiPo elements.
In addition to fast charging via Quick Charge 3.0 to 18 watts, it supports wireless Qi at 10 watts.
Price: 2 200 1 650 rub., Buy with cashback
3. Wristwatch NAVIFORCE



Not the most original, but some of the most popular Chinese watches. Extremely successful model, sold half a dozen brands.
Naviforce - the main and highest quality among all. And not only among the clones of this hybrid model with digital and analog dials, but also watches with Ali as such.
Price: from 14 500 from 1 300 rub., Buy with cashback
4. ZEALOT Wireless Headphones



Cheap and simple wireless headphones that do pretty well with popular music. There is a fairly adequate noise reduction and the ability to connect wired.
The mechanical buttons are complemented by a single-color LED display with operating mode and remaining charge. And they also have RADIO!
Price: 2 100 1 250 rub., Buy with cashback
5. TOPK night lamp



The combination of a charger and a dim nightlight turned out to be quite successful and practical. The maximum gives 22 watts, on one port - up to 5V / 4.4A.
There is enough light for the bedroom at night, and the power of the charging unit - to slowly replenish the entire set of gadgets per night.
Price: 950 650 rub., Buy with cashback
6. Xiaomi 360 DVR



The new model is from Xiaomi, a little-known partner in Russia, who previously released eminent smartphones (a division of the holding, better known for its antivirus).
The original design allows you to quietly mount under the mirror. Writes 1080p with a viewing angle of 140 degrees, and advanced optics with F2.2 works well at night.
Price: from 6,750 from 4,800 rubles., Buy with cashback
7. RC truck LeadingStar



A powerful radio-controlled truck will delight not only children, but also adults. Of the obvious shortcomings is the all-plastic construction.
The base kit (which has everything you need to start the race, including the remote control) is easily upgraded and a powerful truck for real off-road.
Price: from 42 150 from 2 900 rubles., Buy with cashback
8. Power supply at 60 W Baseus



An excellent charger designed to recharge the batteries of all wearable gadgets: from backpacks with Power Delivery to smartphones with Quick Charge. True only through USB-C.
Regular USBs work with other fast protocols, delivering up to 5V / 4.4A at the same time. It also works with low-current devices.
Price: 2 700 1 750 rub., Buy with cashback
9. Xiaomi coffee machine



The most common drip machine, of which there are many offline. Able to brew tea and coffee, half a liter in 10 minutes.
The case is made of plastic, the bowl is completely glass, the brewing capacity and internal volume are made of stainless medical steel. Nothing special - but Xiaomi.
Price: 4 500 2 250 rub., Buy with cashback
10. Mark Ryden Urban Backpack



One of the best backpacks with AliExpress. An asymmetric main pocket facilitates access to content, helping to put a little more than in brothers of a similar capacity.
It has well-thought-out instructions and a sufficient number of pockets. Available in two versions: on 1 and 2 compartments (excluding a pocket for a laptop).
Price: 6 100 2 750 rub., Buy with cashback
11. Ideas For Life Electric Kettle



This accessory will help tea lovers not to be without boiling water on long trips. Boils slowly, but always at hand. Better than a thermos.
It is powered from the vehicle‚Äôs onboard network 12V from the cigarette lighter, installed directly in the cup holder of the front pair of seats.
Price: from 2 450 from 1 250 rub., Buy with cashback
12. Xiaomi walkie talkie



Popular radio stations with a stylish modern design. There are 2 models to choose from: both on 16 channels, but with different ranges - up to 1 or up to 5 kilometers.
The second and the battery are one and a half times more. True, it is more expensive, and in the kit there is still only 1 walkie-talkie.
Price: from 2 100 from 1 900 rub., Buy with cashback
13. Smart socket Lonsonho



An interesting version of a smart outlet with an LED multicolor ring at the end, which are configured from a companion application.
Works with Alexa, Google Assistant and IFTTT. In addition, it can physically turn on and off with a button. Designed for current up to 16A.
Price: 1 300 850 rub., Buy with cashback
14. VONTAR Universal Keyboard



The ‚Äúmost fashionable‚Äù keyboard for Smart TV, TV boxes and other compact electronics without its own touchscreen / manipulator.
Favorably distinguished among analogs by its accurate and large touch panel with multitouch support, a well-thought-out QWERTY keyboard with useful quick keys and pleasant backlighting.
Price: from 1,100 from 800 rubles., Buy with cashback
15. Xiaomi leather sneakers



Great shoes, or sneakers in a classic style from Xiaomi partners, the company itself has nothing to do with it.
However, the model uses the familiar Mijia orthopedic pads and insoles, their advanced multi-layer outsole and an excellent anti-slip sole.
Price: 5,200 4,700 rubles., Buy with cashback
Important: do not forget to save
P.S. To get the maximum benefit from the sale, do not forget to install the LetyShops extension and activate the cashback through registration on the site.
